metadata.subject: CNN - Kuhn - US-China Tariffs, Trade War - CNN Today - 8.2.2018.pdf; Untitled attachment 200384.htm

relationships.description: Kuhn is updating Epstein on project progress and seeking to arrange meetings
Kuhn has worked with Getzels for 12 years and wants to introduce him to Epstein
Coordinating for staffing referrals for the Radical Breakthroughs project

analysis.purpose: To update Jeffrey Epstein on the progress of the Radical Breakthroughs project, arrange potential meetings, and share media coverage of US-China trade war
analysis.significance: Shows professional collaboration between Robert Kuhn and Jeffrey Epstein on a science documentary project, with Epstein apparently serving in an advisory or consulting capacity

notable_quotes: Breakthroughs is a Big Project, big opportunity for impact. All are truly excited.
I'd like you to meet Peter Getzels, Closer To Truth producer/director... he would very much like to meet you in person, describe the Radical Breakthroughs process in detail, get your feedback.
caution: a few weeks old is ancient history in Trump time

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail, coercion, or pressure tactics found. Communication appears to be standard professional correspondence about a documentary project.

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced. This is a routine professional email about documentary production and media sharing.

details: References to CNN coverage of US-China trade war
Links to CGTN news articles about trade war

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be routine professional correspondence about a documentary project. The US-China trade war was widely covered in media at the time. The association with Epstein may be of interest given his later notoriety.

analysis.summary: Robert Kuhn emails Jeffrey Epstein to update him on the progress of the 'Radical Breakthroughs' documentary project, arrange potential meetings with the producer Peter Getzels, and share recent media coverage of the US-China trade war, showing Epstein's involvement in a professional science documentary production.
